samples.name: Flow Chart
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the processing of an order placed using credit card with built-in flow shapes.

samples.name: Nodes
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the different stages of a software development life cycle using a circular flow diagram. Customizing the appearance of the nodes is illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Shapes
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component illustrates basic built-in shapes, such as basic shapes, flow shapes, and BPMN shapes.

samples.name: HTML Shapes
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates how to host a HTML element inside a node. In this example, a Gauge control is hosted inside a HTML Node.

samples.name: Connectors
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the data flow in a marketing process using predefined shapes and connectors. Different types of connectors and decorators are used to customize the appearance, path, and direction of the data flow.

samples.name: Line Routing
samples.description: This sample visualizes the connectors that are automatically re-routing or moving away if any shape found on the connectors path.

samples.name: Avoid Connector Overlap
samples.description: This sample visualizes the connectors that automatically adjust to minimize visual overlap, ensuring clear and distinct representations of connections within the diagram.

samples.name: Annotations
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component illustrates the competitive environment of a business through five forces chart. The elements of the five force chart is described using nodes and annotations. Customizing the position and appearance of the annotation is illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Ports
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the process flow of publishing a book using connection points. Connection points are static points over the shapes that allow creating connections to the shapes. Customizing the size and appearance of the connection points is illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Swimlane
samples.description: This sample  Different types of connectors and decorators are used to customize the appearance, path, and direction of the data flow.

samples.name: Container
samples.description: This sample  illustrates the Container shape usage, container and its child relationship.

samples.name: Grouping and Ordering
samples.description: This sample illustrates how to group, ungroup, and order commands with the diagram.

samples.name: Events
samples.description: This sample trace the diagram events while performing interaction in diagram.

samples.name: History Manager
samples.description: This sample  Different types of connectors and decorators are used to customize the appearance, path, and direction of the data flow.

samples.name: Commands
samples.description: This sample illustrates the various commands supported in the diagram control

samples.name: Constraints
samples.description: This sample illustrates how node constraints are used to restrict end-users from performing certain operations on nodes and connector constraints are used to restrict end-users from performing certain operation on connectors

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This sample shows the feature of tooltip in diagram control

samples.name: Symbol Palette
samples.description: This example illustrates predefining shapes in a palette that can be easily dragged and dropped into the drawing area. Customizable options of the symbol palette are also illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Zooming and Panning
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes how to zoom and pan in the diagram

samples.name: Snapping
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes how diagram objects snap to the nearest intersection of gridlines or objects while being dragged or resized.

samples.name: Scrolling
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes how to scroll a diagram using vertical and horizontal scrollbars

samples.name: Drawing Tools
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes how to build a diagram interactively using drawing tools. Continuous draw option, snapping, and undo/redo support are enabled to easily draw diagrams. Rulers, gridlines, and snapping options are enabled to easily align objects.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component illustrates interaction with diagram control using shortcut keys. Command Manager support is used to manage keyboard interactions.

samples.name: User Handles
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes a simple flow diagram along with options to execute the frequently used commands using user handles.

samples.name: Overview Panel
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes an organizational structure along with an overview for easily navigating the large organizational structure using Overview Panel.

samples.name: Organizational Chart
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component illustrates a simple business management structure that is built from an external data source. Hierarchical tree layout algorithm is used to build organizational charts. Customizing the orientation and structure of the organizational chart is illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Flowchart Layout
samples.description: This sample illustrates the flowchart layout algorithm that is used to automatically arrange the flow shapes.

samples.name: Mind Map
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates the concept of creativity using mind map layout algorithm. User handles are used to extend the mind map interactively.

samples.name: Hierarchical Tree
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component illustrates a simple hierarchical tree that is built from an external data source. Hierarchical tree layout algorithm is used to build hierarchical trees. Customizing the spacing between objects and orientation of the trees is illustrated in this example.

samples.name: Complex Hierarchical Tree
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates a complex hierarchical template that is built from an external data source using complex hierarchical tree algorithm.

samples.name: Radial Tree
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates a huge organizational structure using a compact layout model. Radial tree layout algorithm is used to build such a layout.

samples.name: Symmetric Layout
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes a simple network template using symmetrical layout algorithm.

samples.name: RTL Tree
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the concept of Artificical Intelligence using hierarchical tree layout algorithm

samples.name: PERT Chart
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes a project development process using Program Evaluation Review Technique (PERT). Complex hierarchical tree layout algorithm is used to automatically arrange the nodes.

samples.name: Hierarchical Layout with multiple roots
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the structure of an Electricity Sector using complex hierarchical layout with multiple roots

samples.name: Local Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the classifications of species using hierarchical tree layout algorithm. Data Manager support is used to bind data with the diagram.

samples.name: Remote Data
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates binding remote data with the diagram using the Data Manager support.

samples.name: Virtualization
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the default UI virtualization functionality. Scroll the diagram for UI virtualization experience.

samples.name: Save and Load
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes building diagrams interactively and editing the saved diagrams. Symbol Palette is used to easily build diagrams.

samples.name: Print and Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component demonstrates printing and exporting the diagram as images.

samples.name: BPMN Editor
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visualizes the hotel booking reservation system and its built with readymade BPMN shapes.

samples.name: Logic Circuit Diagram
samples.description: This sample visualizes implementation of three input Boolean functions using universal logic gates, and it is designed with diagram `custom` nodes.

samples.name: UML Activity Diagram
samples.description: This sample visualizes graphical representation of message flow from one activity to another in customer service with built-in `UML activity` shapes.

samples.name: UML Sequence Diagram
samples.description: This sample presents a UML sequence diagram to depict interactions in a secure transaction process involving a user, transaction system, and fraud detection using diagram model.

samples.name: UML Class Diagram
samples.description: This sample visualizes the class diagram shapes.

samples.name: Shortest Path Visualizer
samples.description: Visualize shortest paths using Dijkstra’s algorithm in Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Interactive graph with animated connectors and dynamic node styling.

samples.name: Tournament Bracket
samples.description: Follow the UEFA Champions League journey with Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Interactive bracket with match details, animated progression, and champion highlights.

samples.name: Ticket Booking
samples.description: Book cinema seats interactively with Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Select seats by tier, view real-time pricing, and confirm bookings with dynamic updates and responsive design.

samples.name: Spiral Diagram
samples.description: Visualize the software development lifecycle with a spiral diagram in Syncfusion EJ2. Interactive nodes, custom icons, and tooltips illustrate iterative project stages from ideation to deployment.

samples.name: Image Puzzle
samples.description: Play a sliding image puzzle with Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Drag tiles, track moves and time, and enjoy multiple themes with pause and clue options.

samples.name: Periodic Table
samples.description: Explore the Periodic Table interactively with Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Color-coded elements, hover details, and dynamic highlighting by period and group make learning chemistry engaging.

samples.name: History Timeline
samples.description: Explore Internet history with an interactive timeline built using Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Add, edit, and visualize key milestones with  color-coded segments.

samples.name: Funnel Diagram
samples.description: Infographic funnel diagram with customizable node shapes and colors, showing stage-wise conversion and cumulative rates to assess marketing performance.

samples.name: Family Tree Diagram
samples.description: Visualize family relationships with Syncfusion® EJ2 Vue Diagram. Arrange members in a complex hierarchical layout, showing names, tenure, and clear connections between spouses and children.

samples.name: Serpentine Diagram
samples.description: Visualizes a custom serpentine layout with the Diagram component, featuring 20 key medical breakthroughs that revolutionized healthcare (1796–1996).

samples.name: Solar Panel Angle
samples.description: Demonstrate a smart solar panel tilt system using Syncfusion® EJ2 Vue Diagram. Interactively adjust panel angles, track efficiency, and optimize based on sun position and location.

samples.name: P&ID Diagram
samples.description: Simulate a real-time chemical reactor P&ID using Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Control fluid flows, tank levels, and temperature with interactive elements and live animations.

samples.name: Neural Network
samples.description: Explore neural network architecture with Syncfusion EJ2 Diagram. Visualize layers, weights, and data flow with nodes and connections.

samples.name: Venn Diagram
samples.description: This Vue Venn Diagram shows set relationships and overlapping data visualization for statistical analysis and logical comparisons.

samples.name: Network Diagram
samples.description: This sample visualizes graphical layout of a network diagram using diagram `Native (SVG)` shapes.

samples.name: Fishbone Diagram
samples.description: This demo for Essential<sup>®</sup> JS2 Diagram component visually represents a simple fishbone diagram (Ishikawa). Diagram nodes and annotations are used to define fishbone diagrams. Read-only mode is enabled here.

samples.name: Workflow Editor
samples.description: This sample visualizes the Workflow of processes and tasks related to travel requests, approvals, and bookings within an organization

samples.name: DataBinding with treeview
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to create a tree view and a diagram with a datasource.

samples.name: Flow Execution
samples.description: This sample  Different types of connectors and decorators are used to customize the appearance, path, and direction of the data flow.
